current.first-slide-text: Daymond John has come a long way from turning a $40 budget into FUBU, a $6 billion fashion game-changer. Throughout his career, Daymond has continued to be an entrepreneur in every sense of the word. He is not only a pioneer in the fashion industry but a Shark on the 4-time Emmy Award winning Shark Tank, a New York Times best-selling author, branding guru, and highly sought-after motivational speaker.
current.second-slide-text: With years of experience as both a successful entrepreneur and mentor, Daymond landed a co-starring role on ABC’s business show, Shark Tank. Throughout his ten seasons on the show, Daymond has given countless aspiring entrepreneurs the opportunity to work alongside him and his team, showing them the ins and outs of what they need to take their business to the next level. As “The Peoples Shark”, Daymond has made an impact on the hopeful entrepreneurs vying for an investment in the Tank, as well as the millions of weekly viewers sitting at home, through his relatable story and journey to success that continues to both motivate and inspire. As the most watched program on Friday nights, Shark Tank has maintained an impressive average weekly viewership of over 8 million and has won 4 Emmy Awards. Shark Tank is also syndicated on CNBC, and continues to be the channel’s top rated show.
current.third-slide-text: Daymond created his brand consulting company, The Shark Group, to reveal the secrets that made FUBU a $6 billion global brand and reinvigorated the once defunct Coogi brand into the biggest fashion line in its space. Consulting for some of the top Fortune 500 as well as some of the most innovative, growing companies in the world. Daymond and The Shark Group share advice and experience on branding, licensing, social media, influencer integration, marketing strategy and overall business consultation. As a brand consultant, Daymond and his team will examine the needs of the corporation, dissect the problems and create manageable solutions for brand growth.
current.fourth-slide-text-1: As a motivational speaker, Daymond's quintessential rags-to-riches success story of sacrifice, hard work, and perseverance as well as the unique and charismatic way he communicates it, will inspire any audience.
current.fourth-slide-text-2: With a unique “music inspired” keynote and his famous fireside chat, Daymond has the unique ability to step out of the tank and give you a look behind the curtain and the secrets he used to become a massive success.
current.fifth-slide-text-1: As a consultant, Daymond will examine the needs of your business, dissect the problems, and create manageable solutions for brand growth. He will also help improve your business' profitability by enhancing the marketing structure and strategy.
current.fifth-slide-text-2: As a motivational speaker, Daymond's quintessential rags-to-riches success story of sacrifice, hard work, and perseverance as well as the unique and charismatic way he communicates it, will inspire any audience.
current.pob_cta_text: FREE CHAPTER OF THE POWER OF BROKE AND A FREE GUIDE ON MY SHARK POINTS
current.quote_text: From humble beginnings to the personification of the American dream, "The People’s Shark"®, Daymond John, shares his rags-to-riches journey.
current.testimonial1: It looks like you haven't setup your testimonials section yet. Please visit the theme settings area in the admin and configure them to your liking. We recommned around 35 words per testimonial.

current.testimonial3: It looks like you haven't setup your testimonials section yet. Please visit the theme settings area in the admin and configure them to your liking. We recommned around 35 words per testimonial.
current.ambassador_content: Reflecting on the past years, I am blown away by the incredible response I have received and continue to receive for The Power of Broke and now, Rise and Grind. Every day on social media, through email and in person, I see how these book shave inspired you all to think outside the box and recognize the resources you didn’t know you had. This past January, I officially launched my newest book, Rise and Grind. As the follow up to The Power of Broke, I’ve interviewed some of the world’s most successful people as they share the daily habits, rituals and routines that have helped them overcome challenges and remain focused on the road to success. At the end of the day, you’ve got to rise and grind, because grit, persistence and good old-fashioned hard work are the backbone to success. I worked tirelessly for the past two years to make sure that this book is perfect, going through it word by word and page by page – practicing what I preach, of course. But, we can’t forget about the power of teamwork. An entrepreneur is only as good as those they surround themselves with. That is why I am writing you to join my team of Ambassadors. I need your help to continue spreading this important message, not only to aspiring entrepreneurs but to all the executives working for big corporations, moms raising families and students working toward graduation. The message portrayed reveals the keys to maximizing your 24 hours each and every day. And, I want you on my team to help spread it. Join me on this journey.
current.ambassador_title2: As a Rise and Grind Ambassador, you get to work with me on this new project.
current.ambassador_content2:
Some of the perks of being an Ambassador include:
  • An opportunity to work with Daymond John and his team
  • • An opportunity to receive Rise and Grind Swag, signed books, exclusive offers & other giveaways
  • Invitation to an EXCLUSIVE Facebook Community
  • Receive never before seen content crafted just for the Ambassador team
  • Access to a Webinar with Daymond John
  • And more!

settings.title: Why I Created The Grind Points Guide

settings.ad_title: Have a Business Idea But Don't know how to Start?

settings.section_title: The 8 Musts Business Needs for Success
settings.icon_1_text: These 8 items have been used successfully with thousands of businesses to increase revenue and maximize profits
settings.icon_2_text: These 8 items have been used successfully with thousands of businesses to increase revenue and maximize profits
settings.icon_3_text: Print out this scorecard and worksheet and follow along in real time.
settings.icon_4_text: Body text in a short summary

settings.icon_1_title: How to identify your target market
settings.icon_1_text: Learn who your ideal customer is, how to serve them, and what gets them to buy
settings.icon_2_text: Video training explaining how to find that perfect customer
settings.icon_3_text: Learn how to better communicate with your target customer
settings.icon_4_text: Body text in a short summary

settings.section_title: A Step-by-Step Guide to Product Validation
settings.icon_1_text: The key points to consider when creating and validating a product/service or idea
settings.icon_2_text: Video training explaining how and why this is such a vital part of your product journey
settings.icon_3_text: A printable checklist to get you started on your product validation journey
settings.icon_4_text: Body text in a short summary

settings.icon_1_text: I created this guide to be an endless source of motivation for you. From identifying your why and defining your version of success, to setting goals and putting a plan in place to achieve them, this will be your roadmap to success. Remember, you are in control of your success.
settings.icon_2_text: Body text in a short summary
settings.icon_3_text: Body text in a short summary
settings.icon_4_text: Body text in a short summary

settings.icon_1_text: Have you ever heard a business term and thought to yourself, “What the heck does that mean?” Or was watching Shark Tank and had to ask someone to clarify what the deal means? Don’t worry, we’ve all been there before. But now, with this guide, there’s no excuse for you to cautiously nod your head as if you know what the other person is talking about.
settings.icon_2_text: Body text in a short summary
settings.icon_3_text: Body text in a short summary
settings.icon_4_text: Body text in a short summary

settings.icon_1_text: As an entrepreneur, it is so important to understand you must never stop learning. My SHARK Points Guide is a great step in the right direction towards that goal. Learn as much as you can every day because once you stop challenging yourself, you will stop using the power of broke mindset and become stagnant in all facets.
settings.icon_2_text: Body text in a short summary
settings.icon_3_text: Body text in a short summary
settings.icon_4_text: Body text in a short summary

settings.icon_1_text: Email marketing is important for building relationships with potential customers, leads, current customers, and even past customers. Email marketing gives you a chance to speak directly to them, in their inbox, at a time that is convenient for them. Using my Email Marketing Strategy Map, marketing through email will become an integral part of your overall business marketing plan.
settings.icon_2_text: Body text in a short summary
settings.icon_3_text: Body text in a short summary

settings.icon_1_text: Social media is an essential piece of your business marketing strategy. Different social platforms help you connect with your customers, increase awareness about your brand, and boost your leads and sales. More than three billion people around the world use social media and are subjected to advertisements and new businesses every month. Using my Social Media Marketing Guide, you will learn what social media platforms to use, what and how to post, when to post content, how to connect with influencers, build a community and drive engagement.
settings.icon_2_text: Body text in a short summary
settings.icon_3_text: Body text in a short summary
settings.icon_4_text: Body text in a short summary

settings.icon_1_text: As an entrepreneur and businessperson, you will always need to pitch your business, products and services to potential clients and investors. Using my Sales Pitch Script, I will teach you how to make a strong first impression, get past gatekeepers, and pitch decision makers to potential clients and investors that will make them think (in a good way) and help ensure they want to invest in you and your business. This guide walks you through, step-by-step, on how to make the right first impression, explain your product/service and briefly explain why you and your business are worth investing in.
settings.icon_2_text: Body text in a short summary
settings.icon_3_text: Body text in a short summary
settings.icon_4_text: Body text in a short summary

settings.interviewee_title: Dallas Mavericks Owner, Shark, Experienced Investor and Business Maven
settings.interviewee_quote:
Culture is important in any and every company. Culture gives people guidance in how to
approach and solve problems. It’s a guiding light when it comes to dealing with fans and
customers. It’s the foundation for who we are in the community.

settings.product_description: There are various sources of money out there, but finding the right ones for your business is important. This online training course includes equity and debt financing, crowdfunding, asset based loans, venture capital and private (Angel) Investors, lines of credit,
Once you’ve registered your business entity you’re ready to apply for business credit, right? Wrong. This course will show you the additional steps needed before you’re ready to apply.

Learn why you need a business plan and what must be included in your plan for it to get attention. This course includes why you need a business plan, the musts haves of a business plan, and what an investor looks for in a business plan.

Validating your product, service or idea is a major step in bringing it to market and getting it out there. In this 9-part course, you'll learn the steps you need to take in the validation and branding process.

A marketing plan is one of the key components that is necessary to start, maintain and grow a successful business and you need to understand what's involved. Learn how to advertise, build a marketing strategy, website, blogs, social media, email marketing
The fundamentals of business are the foundation on which a successful business is built. In this course, I'll share what you need to know to lay your business foundation.

Join the thousands of entrepreneurs who have learned from Daymond’s 25 years of successes and failures! Daymond on Demand students have taken their knowledge and applied it to their business generating 6 - 7 figures in revenue.

Daymond on Demand Start Up Blueprint is my digital training program for people who want to start their own businesses but don't know where to begin. This is the perfect course to get started as soon as possible!

settings.interviewee_title: DALLAS MAVERICKS OWNER, SHARK, EXPERIENCED INVESTOR AND BUSINESS MAVEN
settings.interviewee_quote: Culture is important in any and every company. Culture gives people guidance in how to approach and solve problems. It’s a guiding light when it comes to dealing with fans and customers. It’s the foundation for who we are in the community.

settings.interviewee_title: Executive TV Producer, Manager of the Kardashian Empire, Momager Extraordinaire
settings.interviewee_quote: We showed ourselves as we truly were. We showed our lives and our loves and shared the things that truly mattered to us, without filter. That’s what people responded to, and all of a sudden people all over the world were really invested in us and what we’re up to as a family. It changed everything.

settings.interviewee_title: World #1 Ranked Tennis Player from 1966-68, 1971-72, and 1974, International Tennis Hall of Fame Inductee, Dedicated Driver for Equality
settings.interviewee_quote: When I was 13, I was at the Los Angeles Tennis Club and I started daydreaming, and I started thinking about my sport. And everyone wore white shoes, white socks, black clothes, played with white balls. And I asked myself, ‘Where is everybody else?’ So that was my moment where I decided I would fight for equality and inclusion.

settings.interviewee_title: Founder and CEO of Billy Gene Is Marketing, Social Media Advertising Expert, Marketing Influencer with Unwavering Resolve
settings.interviewee_quote: I finally realized like, look, as long as I have my superpower, which is this whole marketing and advertising thing, I can sit at the table with whoever...at the end of the day, it’s not who you know. Everyone says this, ‘well it depends on who you know.’ No. It’s who knows you.

settings.interviewee_title: Founder and CEO of Mutt’s Sauce, Fourth Generation Service Member, Devoted to Family and Inspiring Others
settings.interviewee_quote: I do it because my grandfather sacrificed so much for his family. Because I’m fourth-generation military, and that means something. Because my mother gave up everything so I could get an education. Because everything is connected and things happen for a reason. I tell people all the time they need to spend some time understanding that reason, to harness that why, so that they can know their purpose.

settings.interviewee_title: Primetime Emmy Award Winner, Shark Tank Executive Producer, Creator of Opportunity
settings.interviewee_quote: The Sharks keep doing Shark Tank because they love sharing their knowledge, knowing they are helping entrepreneurs and viewers who were just like them. The viewers realize that at one point in the Sharks’ lives, they were in the same position as the entrepreneur standing on the rug pitching the Sharks, someone with little more than a dream.

settings.interviewee_title: Mother, Digital Manager, Virtual Work Force Aficionado
settings.interviewee_quote: It was a lot of hard work and I sacrificed a lot in the short-term. I was terrified of that risk but I’m so proud of where it has led me now. Some days I still work A LOT, but I get to see my family all day, I like what I do and I love our clients. I think that’s part of finding success in the virtual workforce - you have to show up harder, be more dedicated and have a desire to serve.

settings.interviewee_title: Co-founders and Chief Officers at Shark Tank’s Most Successful Business, Bombas, Passionate Humanitarians
settings.interviewee_quote:
The idea of being able to give back and pay it forward so that one day maybe they will do the same, I think there’s a lot of pride in that.” (Dave)

“People are just kind of hungry for opportunities to give back, I think it’s human nature. (Randy)

settings.interviewee_title: Decorated Olympic Athlete, Philanthropist, Fierce Competitor
settings.interviewee_quote: I think that women want to look to someone to give them determination, to keep going as well..I think to a lot of women I give that aspiration to them because I never stay down. I always get back up and they want to do the same thing.

settings.interviewee_title: International Grammy Award Winning Artist, Education-Focused Philanthropist, Global Music and Entertainment Sensation
settings.interviewee_quote: If there’s anything that my family taught me, being a first-generation Cuban American, anything worth fighting for is freedom. And to me, that’s what entrepreneurship is about, that’s what Powershift is about. You’re really fighting for independence, to be able to maneuver and navigate the way you want to.

settings.interviewee_title: Co-Founder of Away, 2016 Forbes 30 Under 30 Recipient, Savvy Businesswoman with an Entrepreneurial Spirit
settings.interviewee_quote: Even if we only launched with a few customers, we took care to nurture each of those relationships, making sure their feedback was heard and we included them in the conversation every step of the way.

settings.product_title: Part 3: Relationships – Make a  Connection Last

settings.interviewee_title: Founder and CEO of SkinnyGirl, Founder of B Strong Foundation, Steadfast Businesswoman
settings.interviewee_quote: I was totally broke and I just could feel a wave cresting. I didn’t know what it was, I couldn’t understand it, I couldn’t see where the pieces were gunna lie. But I could feel a wave cresting. I knew it was coming. You have to be quiet enough to hear that. And then you know that you’re on a rocket ship and you have to stay on.
